backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister actor with types for policies, users, products, orders, educational content, and startup program data, plus comparison helpers and storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Adds a new policySignaturesByUser map during migration while preserving existing state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file for build planning.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining metadata, icons, PWA manifest link, and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest specifying app metadata, icons, colors, categories, and screenshots.
Full privacy policy detailing data collection, usage, rights, cookies, and contact info.
Detailed returns policy covering eligibility, exclusions, process, refunds, and contact info.
frontend/public/policies/shipping-policy: Shipping policy outlining methods, costs, processing, tracking, international rules, and contact info.
frontend/public/policies/terms-and-condi: Outlines platform terms including user obligations, marketplace rules, payments, liability limits, dispute resolution, and account termination policies.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the app's router, query client, and page routes for all major site sections including policies, blogs, FAQs, and settings.
frontend/src/components/admin/assistant/: Provides UI to view, search, add, and edit assistant knowledge base entries with modal dialogs and mutation hooks.
Lists unanswered questions and allows converting them into knowledge base entries via a dialog workflow.
frontend/src/components/admin/Marketplac: Displays and refreshes marketplace roadmap data with progress tracking and error handling using admin dashboard queries.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserRoleMa: Shows counts of user roles with loading and permission error states using role summary data.
frontend/src/components/assistant/Assist: Implements the main assistant chat interface with text input, speech recognition, text‑to‑speech, and multi‑mode conversation handling.
Renders a floating button that opens a chat widget containing the AssistantChatPanel.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with legal links, contact information, and accepted payment methods and partners.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Provides the global layout including header navigation, login handling, banner, mobile menu, and wrapped content output.
frontend/src/components/policies/PolicyD: Loads and renders markdown policy content, showing metadata, errors, and signature alerts based on user identity.
frontend/src/components/policies/PolicyS: UI for reviewing and signing policies, managing acceptance state and submitting signatures to the backend.
frontend/src/components/policies/Require: Checks whether all required policies are signed and blocks access with a prompt if any remain unsigned.
frontend/src/components/privacy/CookieCo: Displays a cookie consent banner and stores the user's accept or reject choice.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Form component for creating a user profile, saving name and email via backend mutation with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/RouterErrorScree: Displays an error screen for route-related issues with a link back to the home page.
frontend/src/components/RuntimeErrorBoun: Catches runtime errors and shows a fallback UI with error details and a refresh option.
frontend/src/components/security/HumanCh: A dialog that verifies the user is human via a checkbox and simple math challenge before continuing.
frontend/src/components/startup/LessonDe: Shows lesson details with video, HTML content, and controls to navigate back or mark completion.
frontend/src/contexts/VoiceSettingsConte: Provides microphone permission state and voice preference settings through a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssistant.ts: Mutation hook that sends questions to the backend assistant via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login, logout, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useMicrophonePermissi: Manages microphone permission state, checking browser support and requesting access via getUserMedia.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageActivity.ts: Tracks whether the page is active based on visibility and window focus events.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend actor methods for roles, admin data, and related mutations.
Wraps browser speech recognition, handling start/stop, results, errors, and permission-aware behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useTextToSpeech.ts: Provides text‑to‑speech controls using SpeechSynthesis, tracking speaking state and current message.
frontend/src/hooks/useVoicePreferences.t: Manages persisted user voice settings with getters and setters tied to localStorage.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark theme variables and UI utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/cookieConsent.ts: Handles reading and writing cookie consent status to localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/humanCheck.ts: Implements a session‑based human verification flag with a 30‑minute TTL.
frontend/src/lib/policies.ts: Defines policy identifiers and metadata for privacy, shipping, returns, and terms pages.
frontend/src/lib/pricingCopy.ts: Defines centralized pricing copy and store builder pricing details for the platform.
frontend/src/lib/voice/browserVoice.ts: Provides browser speech recognition and text-to-speech support utilities.
Manages voice preference settings using localStorage with versioning.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerBlog.tsx: Displays a grid of customer blog posts with previews and navigation to full posts.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerBlogPost.tsx: Renders full blog post content based on route params.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerFAQ.tsx: Shows customer FAQs using accordion components with pricing-based answers.
Authenticated page showing a placeholder inbox for upcoming messaging features.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerPurchaseHisto: Authenticated page showing a placeholder for future purchase history and tracking.
Settings page handling identity checks, voice permissions, and policy signatures display.
Empty page file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/FunnelsPage.tsx: Empty page file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page showcasing business features, hero section, and navigation to key service areas.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailure.tsx: Empty page file intended to show payment failure state.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccess.tsx: Empty page file intended to show payment success state.
frontend/src/pages/PciCompliancePage.tsx: Displays PCI compliance certificate details with view and download options.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Renders the privacy policy document using shared policy components.
frontend/src/pages/ReturnsPolicyPage.tsx: Renders the returns policy document via shared policy renderer.
frontend/src/pages/SellersBusinessesBlog: Lists multiple business blog posts with categories, excerpts, and navigation to full posts.
Displays full blog post content based on route params with navigation back to blog list.
Renders a FAQ page for B2B services using accordion UI components with predefined questions and answers.
frontend/src/pages/ShippingPolicyPage.ts: Displays the shipping policy by loading a markdown file through the PolicyDocument component.
frontend/src/pages/StartupDashboard.tsx: Empty placeholder page with no content defined.
frontend/src/pages/StoreBuilderPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page intended for store builder functionality.
frontend/src/pages/StorePage.tsx: Empty placeholder page for storefront or product listing features.
frontend/src/pages/TermsConditionsPage.t: Displays the terms and conditions policy via the PolicyDocument component referencing a markdown file.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces and enums for users, products, orders, lessons, meetings, activities, business data, integrations, and store builder configuration.
frontend/src/types/speech.d.ts: Provides TypeScript definitions for the Web Speech API including SpeechRecognition and related event types.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, features, and compliance-related notes for the ANC Electronics web app.
